front.title: Support of address families in OSPFv3

abstract.t: This document describes an extensible mechanism to support Address Families in OSPFv3. One undefined field in the Router-LSA is used to define the address-families on a link. A router may participate in multiple address families on different links. This information needs to be advertised so that only applicable link are used in the SPF calculation when building an address family specific shortest path tree.
